entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Athabasca
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Athabasca 1:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:57 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
